description.value:
Shipmate

You worked as a sailor or dockhand on or near the sea. You’ve honed your body and braved the hardships of the high seas. You’ve learned how to operate and tend to ships, and perhaps even fill a specific role such as helmsman, cook, navigator, carpenter, first mate, boatswain, or quartermaster.

Ability Score Increase. Your Strength, Dexterity, or Wisdom increases by 1. Your Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution increases by 1.

Seas and Sails. You have a swimming and climbing speed of 30ft. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.9CM5YMS3E6D51BDR]{Seas and Sails}

Skills. Choose one from: Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, Perception, Survival.

Languages. One of your choice.

Other. You gain proficiency with one of the following: Navigator’s Tools, Cook’s Utensils, Carpenter’s Tools, Vehicles (Water), a musical instrument, Net (weapon), or a language.
